work.name: VRI, UFPR
work.summary: Working on Face Anti-Spoofing with particular concerns for model locality and data-induced bias (advisor: David Menotti)

work.name: C3SL, UFPR
work.summary: Scientific initiation project (advisor: Marcos Didonet del Fabro) on the Node2Vec algorithm for graph node embedding and word complexity estimation with NLP tools
summary: Took part in SemEval 2021 shared task 1

work.name: PET Computação, UFPR
work.position: Cybersecurity Researcher and Frontend Developer (multiple projects)
work.summary: Worked on multiple projects in extension, research and education
highlights: Organized a series of workshops on Computer Science
Presented workshops on basic web development and advanced use of text editors (VIm, EMACS)
Developed the frontend for a website with past exercises to help students prepare for exams

Researched Ant Colony Optimization for use in call graphs in detecting malware software
